problem_text_cn: 如图是折叠小板凳的左视图,图中有两个等腰三角形框架,其中一个三角形框架的腰长为4,底边长为6,另一个三角形框架的腰长为2,则相应的底边长为()
problem_text_en: The figure is the left view of the folding stool. There are two isosceles triangle frames in the picture. One of the triangle frames has a waist length of N_0 and a bottom edge length of N_1, and the other triangle frame has a waist length of N_2, and the corresponding bottom edge length is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵△AOB与△COD均是等腰三角形,∴OA=OB=2,OC=OD=4,\frac{0A}{OC}=\frac{OB}{OD}=\frac{2}{4}=\frac{1}{2},∵∠AOB=∠COD,∴△AOB∽△COD,∴\frac{AB}{CD}=\frac{1}{2},\frac{AB}{6}=\frac{1}{2},解得AB=3．
故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是相似三角形的应用,先根据题意判断出△AOB与△COD相似是解答此题的关键．
